description.german: Aktiviere den Pauseeffekt-Koop und hüpfe auf 3 anderen Spielern herum.
description.french: Se faire aider par 3 joueurs différents utilisant l'effet de pause en co-op.
description.italian: Aiuta 3 diversi giocatori usando l'effetto pausa co-op.
description.koreana: 협동 플레이에서 일시정지 효과를 사용해서 3명의 다른 플레이어들을 도우세요.
description.spanish: Ayuda a 3 jugadores diferentes usando el efecto de pausa cooperativo.
description.schinese: 帮助3个不同的玩家使用暂停效果合作。
description.tchinese: 利用暫停效果合作幫助 3 個不同的玩家。
description.russian: Помогите 3 разным игрокам, использующим эффект паузы в кооперативном режиме.
description.thai: ช่วยผู้เล่น 3 คนโดยใช้เอฟเฟกต์หยุดชั่วคราว Co-op
description.japanese: ポーズエフェクトで3人のプレイヤーを助ける
description.polish: Pomóż 3 graczom przy pomocy efektu pauzy w trybie kooperacyjnym.
description.czech: Pomoz v kooperaci 3 různým hráčům použitím efektu pozastavení.
description.turkish: İş birliğinde duraklatma etkisini kullanarak 3 farklı oyuncuya yardım et.
description.brazilian: Ajude 3 jogadores diferentes usando o efeito de pausa de cooperação.

displayName.thai: สหายเต่า

description.french: Nourrir la tortue.
description.italian: Dai da mangiare alla tartaruga.
description.spanish: Alimenta a la tortuga.
description.thai: ให้อาหารเต่า
description.japanese: カメにエサをあげる
description.brazilian: Alimente a tartaruga.

displayName.thai: นักล่าสมบัติ

description.french: Collecter 50 pièces dans la Map 3.
description.italian: Raccogli 50 monete nella mappa 3.
description.spanish: Recoge 50 monedas en el mapa 3.
description.schinese: 在地图3中收集50个游戏币。
description.tchinese: 在地圖 3 收集 50 枚硬幣。
description.thai: เก็บเหรียญ 50 เหรียญใน Map 3
description.japanese: マップ3のコインを50枚集める
description.brazilian: Colete 50 moedas no Mapa 3.

displayName.thai: โปรเกมเมอร์

description.french: Obtenir le bâton Professionnel.
description.italian: Ottieni il bastone pro.
description.spanish: Consigue el palo pro.
description.thai: รับแท่งโปร
description.japanese: Proスティックを手に入れる
description.brazilian: Obtenha o bastão profissional.

displayName.thai: ติ๊กต็อก

description.english: Beat the pear gauntlet with clockwise turns only.
description.german: Hüpfe über die Birnen nur mit Drehungen im Uhrzeigersinn.
description.french: Réussir le parcours d'obstacles des poires dans le sens des aiguilles d'une montre uniquement.
description.italian: Batti il guanto della pera solo con giri in senso orario.
description.spanish: Bate la prueba de la pera sólo con giros en sentido de las agujas del reloj.
description.schinese: 仅以顺时针移动打败梨子挑战。
description.tchinese: 僅在順時針回合擊敗水梨護手。
description.russian: Преодолейте грушевую перчатку только с поворотами по часовой стрелке.
description.thai: เอาชนะถุงมือลูกแพร์ด้วยการหมุนตามเข็มเท่านั้น
description.japanese: 時計回りのみでナシを突破する
description.polish: Pokonaj gruszkowe wyzwanie, skręcając tylko w kierunku zgodnym z ruchem wskazówek zegara.
description.czech: Překonej švestkovou zkoušku pouze salty po směru hodinových ručiček.
description.turkish: Sadece saat yönünde dönüşlerle ayva eldiveni yen.
description.brazilian: Supere a manopla de pera apenas com giros no sentido horário.

displayName.thai: จอมกลั่นแกล้ง!

description.english: Beat the developer in any mode.
description.german: Besiege mich, den Entwickler, in irgendeinem Spielmodus.
description.french: Battre le développeur dans n'importe quel mode.
description.italian: Batti lo sviluppatore in qualsiasi modalità.
description.spanish: Bate al desarollador en cualquier modo.
description.schinese: 在所有模式中打败开发者。
description.tchinese: 在任意模式中擊敗開發者。
description.thai: เอาชนะผู้พัฒนาในโหมดใดๆ
description.japanese: いずれかのモードで開発者を抜かす
description.polish: Pokonaj twórcę gry w dowolnym trybie.
description.brazilian: Supere o desenvolvedor em qualquer modo.

displayName.thai: พุ่งไป A

description.english: Beat map 3 by following route A.
description.german: Sei ein Map 3 Streber und wähle Route A-A-A...
description.french: Réussir la Map 3 en suivant la route A.
description.italian: Batti la mappa 3 seguendo il percorso A.
description.spanish: Bate el mapa 3 siguiendo la ruta A.
description.tchinese: 依循路線 A 破關地圖 3。
description.thai: เอาชนะ Map 3 โดยใช้เส้นทาง A
description.japanese: ルートAを選び続けてマップ3をクリアする
description.turkish: A rotasını takip ederek 3. Haritayı aş.
description.brazilian: Supere o Mapa 3 seguindo a rota A.

displayName.thai: โดดข้ามช่องว่าง

description.french: Traverser l'océan.
description.italian: Attraversa l'oceano.

description.thai: ข้ามมหาสมุทร
description.japanese: 海を飛び越える
description.brazilian: Cruze o oceano.

displayName.thai: ผู้บริสุทธิ์

description.english: Avoid water and rings and beat map 3.
description.german: Verpöne neue Map 3 Mechaniken und ignoriere Wasser und Ringe.
description.french: Éviter l'eau et les anneaux puis réussir la Map 3.
description.italian: Evita l'acqua e gli anelli e completa la mappa 3.
description.spanish: Evita agua y anillos y bate el mapa 3.
description.schinese: 避开水面和圆环并打败地图3。
description.tchinese: 避開水以及圓環，破關地圖 3。
description.russian: Пройдите 3-ю карту, избегая воды и колец.
description.thai: หลบน้ำและวงแหวน แล้วพิชิต Map 3
description.japanese: 水とリングを通らずにマップ3をクリアする
description.polish: Pokonaj mapę 3, unikając wody i pierścieni.
description.czech: Vyhni se vodě i kruhům a dokonči mapu 3.
description.turkish: Sudan ve halkalardan kaçınarak 3. Haritayı aş.
description.brazilian: Evite a água e os anéis e supere o Mapa 3.

description.brazilian: Cruze a ponte quebrada.

displayName.thai: เที่ยวชม Map 3

description.german: Erreiche das Tor über dem Aquädukt.
description.french: Atteindre la porte de ta perte.

description.spanish: Alcanza el portón a tu perdición.

description.japanese: 運命の門にたどり着く
description.czech: Dostaň se k branám své zkázy.
description.brazilian: Chegue ao portão de sua perdição.

description.german: Schaffe Map 1 ohne abzukürzen, und benutze doch bitte das Ei!
description.french: Réussir la Map 1 en mode sans raccourci.
description.italian: Compelta la Mappa 1 in modalità senza salto.

displayName.thai: เหยื่อง่ายๆ

description.english: Beat map 1 in under 10 minutes after getting eaten by the snake.
description.german: Schaffe Map 1 in weniger als 10 Minuten, und lasse dich dabei einmal von der Schlange fressen.
description.french: Réussir la Map 1 en moins de dix minutes après s'être fait manger par le serpent.
description.italian: Completa la Mappa 1 in meno di 10 minuti dopo essere stato mangiato dal serpente.
description.koreana: 맵 1에서 10분 이내로 뱀에게 한번 먹힌 후 클리어하세요.
description.spanish: Bate el mapa 1 en menos de 10 minutos tras ser devorado por una serpiente.
description.schinese: 在被蛇吃掉后用不到10分钟的时间打败地图1。
description.tchinese: 被蛇吞下後 10 分鐘內破關地圖 1。
description.russian: Пройдите 1-ю карту за 10 минут, после того, как вас съест змея.
description.thai: เอาชนะ Map 1 ภายใน 10 นาที หลังจากถูกงูกินเข้าไป
description.japanese: マップ1をヘビに食べられたうえで10分以内にクリアする
description.polish: Pokonaj mapę 1 w poniżej 10 minut po pożarciu przez węża.
description.czech: Dokonči mapu 1 do 10 minut od sežrání hadem.
description.turkish: Yılan tarafından yenildikten sonra 1. Haritayı 10 dakikanın altında aş.
description.brazilian: Supere o mapa 1 em menos de 10 minutos depois de ser comido pela cobra.

displayName.thai: Pogo Legend

description.english: You were a master. Now you are a legend!
description.german: Du warst ein Meister. Nun bist du eine Legende!
description.french: Tu étais un Maître. Dorénavant, tu es une Légende !
description.italian: Eri un maestro. Ora sei una leggenda!
description.spanish: Eras un maestro. Ahora eres una leyenda!
description.schinese: 你曾经是一位大师。现在你已成为传奇！
description.tchinese: 你現在不只是大師，而是傳奇！
description.russian: Вы были мастером. Теперь ты - легенда!
description.thai: คุณเคยเป็นมาสเตอร์ แต่บัดนี้คุณเป็นตำนาน!
description.japanese: これまではマスター、これからはレジェンドだ！
description.czech: Titul mistra už máš. Teď jsi i legenda!
description.brazilian: Você era mestre. Agora é uma lenda!

description.russian: Пройдите бонусную карту Замок Дракулы менее чем за 3 минуты.

description.japanese: ボーナスマップDrakula's Castleを3分以内にクリアする。
description.polish: Pokonaj bonusową mapę Zamek Drakuli w czasie poniżej 3 minut.
description.czech: Poraz bonusovou mapu Drakula's Castle za méně než 3 minuty.
description.turkish: Drakula'nın Kalesi bonus haritasını 3 dakikadan kısa sürede geçin.
description.brazilian: Bata o mapa de bônus do Castelo de Drakula em menos de 3 minutos.

displayName.thai: ระเบียงของ Drakula

description.english: Destroy all 5 Pumpkins in Drakula's Castle.
description.german: Zerstöre alle 5 Kürbisköpfe in Drakulas Festung.
description.french: Détruire les 5 citrouilles dans 'Le Château de Drakula'.
description.italian: Distruggi tutte e 5 le zucche nel Castello di Drakula.
description.koreana: 드라큘라의 성에 있는 5개의 호박을 전부 파괴하세요.
description.spanish: Destruye las 5 calabazas en el Castillo de Drakula.
description.schinese: 摧毁所有5个南瓜在Drakula的城堡。
description.tchinese: 摧毀所有5個南瓜在Drakula的城堡。
description.russian: Уничтожьте все 5 тыкв в замке Дракулы.
description.thai: ทำลายฟักทองทั้ง 5 ตัวในปราสาทของ Drakula
description.japanese: Drakula's Castleで5つのカボチャをすべて破壊する。
description.polish: Zniszcz wszystkie 5 dyń w Zamku Drakuli.
description.czech: Zničte všech 5 dýní ve hře Drakula's Castle.
description.turkish: Drakula'nın Kalesi'ndeki 5 Balkabağı'nın hepsini yok et.
description.brazilian: Destruir todas as 5 Abóboras do Castelo de Drakula.
